snippet: “Smash,” which was buoyed by DVR ratings in its first season, isn’t getting as many eyeballs through delayed viewing this time around.
abstract: “Smash,” which was buoyed by DVR ratings in its first season, isn’t getting as many eyeballs through delayed viewing this time around.

headline.main: 'Smash' Getting Only a Little Help From DVR Numbers
headline.print_headline: DVR Numbers Offer Little Help to ‘Smash’
